Keywords: Doom Patrol
Real Name: Kay Challis
Special Powers
THEY DECIDE WHO I AM TODAY: At the beginning of your turn roll a d6 and turn Crazy Jane to the click number matching the roll. // When Crazy Jane removes a Personality Token roll a d6 and turn her to the click number matching the roll.
YOU HAVE TO BEAT ALL MY PERSONALITIES: When revealing forces, give Crazy Jane a Personality token for each 10 points of her point value. // When Crazy Jane would take damage, instead remove one of her Personality tokens. // When Crazy Jane has no Personality Tokens, KO her. Protected: Pulse Wave.
